body_html: The .grads are None, because they are no longer tensors you created by yourself. It behaves exactly like before, except that the Variable line is now merged into torch.tensor (you probably wrapped them after squaring previously).
body_text: The .grads are None, because they are no longer tensors you created by yourself. It behaves exactly like before, except that the Variable line is now merged into torch.tensor (you probably wrapped them after squaring previously).
body: The `.grad`s are None, because they are no longer tensors you created by yourself. It behaves exactly like before, except that the Variable line is now merged into `torch.tensor` (you probably wrapped them after squaring previously).
